Program Information.Duration: 12 months (2 semesters in-class, 1 semester work experience)

Contact Related Information: Contact George Brown College for information sessions, domestic and international admissions, fees and financial assistance, or program advice. Domestic inquiries: contact Admissions at admissions@georgebrown.ca or visit the Admissions section. International students: contact recruitment representatives through virtual meetings or submitting an inquiry on the International Contact Us page. Financial aid inquiries: contact FinAid@georgebrown.ca or visit the Financial Aid section. For program advice, make an appointment with an Entry Advisor and review FAQs. For Centre for Business inquiries, email business@georgebrown.ca or call (416) 415-5000 ext. 2160. For specific questions about the Human Resources Management (Postgraduate) program, contact Viji Vibhu Prakash at Viji.VibhuPrakash@georgebrown.ca.
